short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Required supporting documents and bids to be submitted by Aug 22, 2023, 2:00pm EDT. 2-year contract with option for extension.
description: Provision of facilities, resources and equipment for close protection training and provision of basic driving training and refresh courses.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

### Tender Details

* **Project Title (English/French):** Close Protection Training Activities / Activités de formation à la protection rapprochée
* **Reference Number (English/French):** WS3993459602-Doc4033045656
* **Amendment Number (English/French):** 5
* **Solicitation Number (English/French):** WS3993459602
* **Publication Date (English/French):** 2023-06-05
* **Tender Closing Date (English/French):** 2023-08-22T14:00:00 (Note: A revised closing time applies. Please refer to [Buyandsell posting][Buyandsell-posting])
* **Amendment Date (English/French):** 2023-08-16
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date (English/French):** 2025-07-31
* **Tender Status (English/French):** Expired / Expiré

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity (English/French):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Mark Hall (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: mark.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: N/A
	+ Fax: N/A
	+ Address: N/A
* **End User Entities (English/French):** Department of National Defence (DND) / Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN)
* **Regions of Opportunity (English/French):** None
* **Regions of Delivery (English/French):** Canada / États-Unis d’Amérique

### Tender Description

The Canadian Government's Department of National Defence (DND) requires a contractor to provide facilities, resources, and equipment to supplement its Close Protection Training, as well as to provide Basic Driving Training and Refresher courses to Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) participants.

Any resulting contract will be for a firm period of two (2) years with the irrevocable option for Canada to extend the period of the Contract by 3 additional 1-year periods, under the same conditions.

### Notice Details

* **Procurement Category (English/French):**
